member.name: T:TSAPI.Controllers.DemoController
member.summary: Methods used only by this Demo application - these methods do not form part of the TSAPI standard

member.name: M:TSAPI.Controllers.SurveysController.Surveys
member.summary: Lists summary information for all surveys.
member.response: The response body contains a serialized array of SurveyDetail

member.name: M:TSAPI.Controllers.SurveysController.Metadata(System.String)
member.summary: Fetches the metadata for a specific survey

member.name: M:TSAPI.Controllers.SurveysController.Interviews(Logic.Query.Queries.NewFolder.InterviewsQuery)
member.summary: Fetches some interview records for a specific survey
